    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Medida del tiempo y ángulos</string>
            <string language="en">Measuring time and angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messende Zeit und Winkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Temps et angles de mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo e ângulos de medição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo ed angoli di misurazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση του χρόνου και των γωνιών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones problemas relacionados con la medida de ángulos y del tiempo. Se estudian también cuestiones relativas a la precisión en las medidas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study problems related to the measurement of angles and time. It also studies problems related to the precision of measurements.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segundos</string>
            <string language="en">seconds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grados</string>
            <string language="en">degrees</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tiempo</string>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">relojes</string>
            <string language="en">clocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">minutos</string>
            <string language="en">minutes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulos</string>
            <string language="en">angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">estimación</string>
            <string language="en">estimation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">medida</string>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, Probleme zu studieren auf dem Messen von Winkeln
und von Zeit in Verbindung stand. Es studiert auch die Probleme,
die auf der Präzision von Messen in Verbindung gestanden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations étudier des problèmes a associées à la mesure des 
angles et du temps. Il étudie également des problèmes liés 
à la précision des mesures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
estudar problemas relacionou à medida dos ângulos e do tempo. 
Estuda também os problemas relacionados à precisão das 
medidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
studiare i problemi ha collegato alla misura degli angoli e del tempo.
Egualmente studia i problemi relativi alla precisione delle 
misure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις στα προβλήματα μελέτης αφορούσε τη μέτρηση των 
γωνιών και του χρόνου. Μελετά επίσης τα προβλήματα σχετικά
με την ακρίβεια των μετρήσεων.</string>
          </description>
